channel.title: Portfolio on Julian Escobar | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Julian Escobar | Portfolio

item.title: Maze 3D
item.description: 3D Castle made in DirectX from scratch, it has different textures and shapes, also uses animated water and 3 different light sources.

item.title: Tower Defense Polygons
item.description: Tower Defense Polygons is a game that combines path finding algorithms and the classic tower defense games.

item.title: Qbert Remake
item.description: This is a remake of the famous classic “Q-bert” using unity.

item.title: Car Combat
item.description: Car combat is a game where you have to destroy all the turrets in order to win, you have a limited time and limited bullets, so be smart of how you use your resources.

item.title: Monster Slayer
item.description: Monster Slayer is a roguelike game that focus on fast mechanics and abilities swaper interaction.
